verses.verse: And in that day <WH3117> thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804>, O YY <WH3068>, I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee: though thou wast angry <WH599> <WH8804> with me, thine anger <WH639> is turned away <WH7725> <WH8799>, and thou comfortedst <WH5162> <WH8762> me.

Behold, 'Elohim <WH410> is my salvation <WH3444>; I will trust <WH982> <WH8799>, and not be afraid <WH6342> <WH8799>: for the YY <WH3050> JEHOVAH <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my song <WH2176>; he also is become my salvation <WH3444>.
Therefore with joy <WH8342> shall ye draw <WH7579> <WH8804> water <WH4325> out of the wells <WH4599> of salvation <WH3444>.

And in that day <WH3117> shall ye say <WH559> <WH8804>, Praise <WH3034> <WH8685> the YY <WH3068>, call <WH7121> <WH8798> upon his name <WH8034>, declare <WH3045> <WH8685> his doings <WH5949> among the people <WH5971>, make mention <WH2142> <WH8685> that his name <WH8034> is exalted <WH7682> <WH8737>.
Sing <WH2167> <WH8761> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> excellent things <WH1348>: this is known <WH3045> <WH8716> <WH8675> <WH3045> <WH8794> in all the earth <WH776>.

Cry out <WH6670> <WH8761> and shout <WH7442> <WH8798>, thou inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802> of TZiyon <WH6726>: for great <WH1419> is HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the midst <WH7130> of thee.
